text: His excellency the president has declared a proclamation summoning parliament on friday, the 28th of April 2017 at 9.30 a.m to communicate to Parliament regarding an essential service order made by him.Therefore, the secretary - general of parliament kindly requests all the Hon.members of Parliament to attend the special meeting of parliament on friday, the 28th of april 2017
title: Special media announcement of the secretary - general of parliament
